response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact on your business, the product is valued at $1,200,000 by us. Considering its immense worth to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $1,150,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a substantial advantage while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to discussing the details and exploring how we can collaborate to benefit both parties.", "product_price": 1150000}
